headline: AES Keeps Dividend Steady, Marks Over a Decade of Increases
summary: The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) is included among the 15 Dividend Stocks Paying 4%+ Yield in 2025. On December 5, The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) announced a quarterly dividend of $0.176 per share, which was consistent with its previous dividend. Overall, it has been rewarding shareholders with growing dividends for the past 12 consecutive years. The recent […]
